title: An CSS Idea: Presentational Primitives
summary: On a personal project, I attempted to use a concept called a "presentational primitive", which is basically a configurable CSS class.
long_summary: On a personal project, I attempted to use a concept called a "presentational primitive", which is basically a configurable CSS class, rather than all components and props. It turns out to be a nice way to codify readable, reusable, and discoverable styles.
